code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Header from"../components/layout/header";import Footer from"../components/layout/footer";import UserTypeCard from"../user/usertypecard";import"../styles/app.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserSelection=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const handleUserSelection=type=>{if(type==="User"){navigate("/userlogin");}else if(type==="Worker"){navigate("/workerlogin");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-selection-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{hideExtras:true,showLogin:false}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Who are you?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserTypeCard,{imageSrc:"/user.png",title:"User",onClick:()=>handleUserSelection("User")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserTypeCard,{imageSrc:"/worker.png",title:"Worker",onClick:()=>handleUserSelection("Worker")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default UserSelection;
